content.question: <math alttext="the limit as x approaches 0, of, the fraction with numerator 5 times x to the fifth power, plus 3 times x squared, plus 18 x, and denominator 3 times x to the fifth power, plus 6 x, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>18</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> is

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the classification of a given expression (e.g., Use the chain rule to find the derivative of a composite function).
